steps.hint: Starting boss - use skill point after kill

steps.description: Complete **Devourer Arena** in Mud Burrow for Skill + Support Gem
steps.hint: After arena, portal out, talk to Renly, waypoint back to Clearfell
Grants Cold Resistance bonus
Important NPC for quest progression

steps.description: Go to **The Grim Tangle** for waypoint
steps.hint: Diamond-shaped zone - find waypoint for orientation
steps.layoutTip: This is a 2-task zone: Find waypoint AND enter The Grim Tangle

steps.description: Complete **Brambleghast Arena** or visit Hut for Witch support + flasks
steps.hint: Brambleghast arena often near Red Vale entrance
Often located near Brambleghast arena
Collect 3 quest runes from obelisks

steps.reward: Runed Girdle, Runed Guard, Runed Skull Cap

steps.hint: Turn in Runed Spikes quest

steps.description: Complete **Rotten Druid Arena** for support gem
Find **Ring** in Ancient Ruin at zone edge
steps.hint: Ancient Ruin located at edge of zone
Located opposite of waypoint

steps.description: Find **Knight support gem** in Haunted Treasure
steps.hint: Knight support in haunted treasure checkpoint

steps.description: Find **Ring** in Ancient Ruin at zone edge
steps.hint: Ancient Ruin located at edge of zone
When gate opens, respawn via ESC menu
Follow edge of zone to find Crowbell
steps.layoutTip: 2 tasks: Kill Crowbell AND enter Farmlands for waypoint

steps.description: Complete **Dryadic Ritual** or **Ritual Altar** for support/skill gems
steps.hint: Dryadic Ritual or Ritual Altar rewards
If you find large ritual early, check swirls pointing to missing ones
Choose Ruby, Sapphire or Topaz Charm (Sapphire recommended)
Roads can be blocked - walk around if needed. Hut is straight along road.

steps.description: Find and clear **Crop Circle** for skill gem
steps.hint: Crop Circle checkpoint on map

steps.description: Talk to **Una** - Turn in **Hooded One** quest

steps.hint: Workshop also has Artificer NPC and optional rune
Located at end of zone

steps.description: Find **Hanged Man support gem** along outer edge
steps.hint: Support gem along outer edge
Find hole, check surroundings to progress
Final boss of Act 1
Complete Act 1
Follow edge to find long passage to arena

steps.description: Portal to town, enter **The Ardura Caravan**

steps.hint: Optional: Artificer in Faridun Cache (side area) - skill gem vendor
Arena is usually north or east
Follow wall with paper talismans
Follow canyon, use stairs after boss

steps.description: Go to sandstorm deeper in area
Desert Map: Enter **Trial of the Sekhemas**, tag Waypoint, return to Town
steps.hint: Optional: Complete Trial for Ascendancy - can do now or later

steps.description: Follow edge, find bridge to **The Lost City**
steps.hint: Optional: Amulet from Shrine of Hotak (check arena stairs)
Optional: Spirit in sarcophagus OR jewel from scarab
Optional: Resist Ring from elemental offering

steps.description: Take **Cinders**, ignite Goddess, take **Essence of Water**

steps.hint: Optional: Support gem in Fossilized Memorial | League: Lightless Passage > Well of Souls (once per league)
Kill hyenas on the way

steps.description: Kill **Iktab, the Deathlord** and **Ekbab, Ancient Steed**, take **Mastodon Tusks**
Desert Map: Enter **Valley of the Titans**
Insert relics near Waypoint, activate **Medallion** (Charm bonus)
Kill **Zalmarath, the Colossus**, take **The Flame Ruby**
Sound the **Horn** at front of caravan

steps.hint: Optional: Artificer in skeleton side area

steps.description: Kill **Hunin, Storm Caller** and **Mugin, Frost Bringer**, take **Djinn Barya**

steps.hint: Find G-pattern or reach far end of zone
Optional: Skill gem arena (Rootdredge) | Ring (Hanging Tree) | Jeweller (Orok Camp near exit)
Optional: Belt from Jungle Grave

steps.description: Take **Corpse-snake Venom** from Corpse (end of zone)

steps.hint: FINAL CHOICE - Cannot be changed later!

steps.description: Waypoint to **Jungle Ruins**, enter **Infested Barrens** (opposite from WP)

steps.hint: WP may require entering 2 side zones along edge
Optional: Flameskin Ritual (25% rarity/fire-res, near center)

steps.description: Kill **Ignagduk, the Bog Witch**, take **Ghastly Spear**
Waypoint to **Infested Barrens**, enter **Chimeral Wetlands** (opposite Azak Bog)
Kill **Xyclucian, the Chimera**, take **Chimeral Inscribed Ultimatum**
steps.hint: Follow edge; if you find Temple of Chaos first, follow opposite edge

steps.description: Waypoint to **Chimeral Wetlands**, enter **Temple of Chaos**
steps.hint: If found previously, waypoint to it; otherwise follow opposite edge
Optional: Complete Trial for Ascendancy - can do now or later

steps.description: Summon **Alva**, take **Small Soul Core**, activate **Stone Altar**
Find **2 more Small Soul Cores**, activate **Stone Altars**

steps.hint: Search side-edges for locked room with stairs

steps.description: Find **2 Medium Soul Cores**, start **2 Generators** (V-shape corners)
steps.hint: Divided zone - each side has find cores, start generator, return to start tasks

steps.description: Kill **Zicoatl, Warden of the Core**, take **Large Soul Core**
Insert **Large Soul Core** at **Stone Altar** (near WP)
Pull all **Canal Levers**, pull large **Canal Lever** (end of zone)
Use **Lever**, pull **Sluice Gate Lever**, kill **Mektul, the Forgemaster**, take **Hammer of Kamasa**
steps.hint: Optional: Do now or later - Talk to Oswald after for reforging bench

steps.description: Waypoint to **Drowned City**, enter **Apex of Filth**
Kill **Queen of Filth** (end of zone), take **Temple Door Idol**
steps.hint: Optional: Quality flasks from Cauldron - find/loot 3 mushrooms in zone

steps.description: Climb stairs twice (corner of pyramid), kill **Ketzuli, High Priest of the Sun**

steps.hint: Kill Goliaths for Sacrificial Heart on the way (also drops next zone)

steps.description: Kill **Goliaths** for **Sacrificial Heart** (if needed), find **plaza altar**
Take **Sacrificial Dagger**, place and stab **Sacrificial Heart** at **Blood Sacrifice altar**
steps.hint: Altar is north of plaza - direct path often blocked

steps.description: Enter **Black Chambers** (east or southwest of Blood Sacrifice)

steps.hint: Zone: mazes connected by bridges

steps.description: Talk to **Doryani** (apocalypse cutscene), talk to **Alva** - Proceed to **Act 4**
Talk to **Doryani**, talk to **Alva** (Book Charter), talk to **Makoru** - Sail to **Isle of Kin**

steps.hint: Optional: Jeweller in Delve Site (edge) | Skill/Support in Beast Pen

steps.description: Kill **Krutog, Lord of Kin** (end of zone), talk to **Hooded One**
steps.hint: Optional: Fire/Lightning Ring (10% quality) in Volcanic Nest - element based on boss killed last

steps.description: Return to **Ship**, talk to **Makoru** - Sail to **Abandoned Prison**
Kill monsters for **Chapel Key**, open **Chapel Door**, tag **Waypoint**
Activate **Goddess of Justice** (Flask recovery, can change later), use **Levers**
Use **Levers**, kill **The Prisoner**, talk to **Hooded One**
Return to **Ship**, talk to **Makoru** - Sail to **Whakapanu Island**

steps.hint: Optional: Support in Crabshell Cave | Skill/Spirit/Support - kill Great White for Fin (turn in to Kaimana in Ngakanu)

steps.description: Kill **Diamora, Song of Death**, talk to **Hooded One**
steps.hint: Optional: All-res Amulet - find Pearl in Clam

steps.description: Return to **Ship**, talk to **Makoru** - Sail to **Shrike Island**
Kill **Scourge of the Skies**, talk to **Hooded One**
steps.hint: Optional: Map piece in Corpse Nest

steps.description: Return to **Ship**, talk to **Makoru** - Sail to **Eye of Hinekora**
steps.hint: NOTE: One of the first four islands will have Matiki to rescue (randomized each league)

steps.description: Talk to **Matiki** and NPCs, activate **Well of Hinekora**

steps.hint: Spirit boost at waterfall between 2nd and 3rd test | Respects in Silent Hall (side area)
Talk to totems to turn in Tattoos

steps.description: Tag **Waypoint**, talk to **Navali**, take **Tattoo of Hinekora**
Return to **Ship**, talk to **Makoru** - Sail to **Arastas**
Tag **Waypoint**, talk to **Missionary Lorandis**, follow him outside
steps.hint: Optional: 3 Exalts & Regals in Bells

steps.description: Destroy **forcefield**, kill **Torvian, Hand of the Saviour**
Kill **Benedictus, First Herald of Utopia**, enter **forge**
Talk to **NPCs**, talk to **Rhodri** (at ship) - Sail to **Ngakanu**
steps.hint: Optional: Talk to Rog (trade All-res Amulet for Pearl) | Kedge Bay side-content (Liquid Emotions, Map piece, Skill gem) | Makoru sail to Plunder's Point
Greater Jeweller: Abyss encounter

steps.description: Defeat **Tavakai** (the Chieftain, the Fallen, and the Consumed), portal to **Town**
Talk to **NPCs**, talk to **Hooded One** - Proceed to **Act 5** (Ogham, Vastiri, or Mount Kriar)
Kill **Heldra of the Black Pyre** and **Isolde of the White Shroud** near **Wall of Darkness**
steps.hint: Optional: Skill gem from corpse along the road

steps.description: Activate all **Runed Megaliths**, go to **center rune**
Kill **Siora, Blade of the Mists**, talk to **Una**
Return to **Scorched Farmlands**, go to **Wall of Darkness**, enter **The Blackwood**

steps.hint: Optional: Omens in Omen Altars
Optional: Rune trader near water

steps.description: Kill **Thane Wulfric** and **Lady Elswyth** (ground floor), portal to **Town**
Talk to **Renly**, talk to **Hooded One** - Proceed to **Vastiri (Act 6)**
Talk to **Asala**, talk to **Zarka**, enter **The Khari Crossing**
Activate **Wayfinder's Seal**, kill **Akthi** and **Anundr**, portal to **Town**
steps.hint: Seal usually 3 or 2 o'clock from arena entrance

steps.description: Talk to **Risu** (Book of Specialization), return to **The Khari Crossing**
Activate **Wayfinder's Seal**, find **Skullmaw Stairway**, take **Molten One's Gift**
steps.hint: Follow arrow under you

steps.description: Find **Merchant Torbik**, enter **The Galai Gates** (usually 7 or 6 o'clock from Torbik)
Waypoint to **Pools of Khatal** (via crossing seal), enter **Sel Khari Sanctuary**
Kill **Elzarah, the Cobra Lord**, talk to **Asala**, portal to **Town**
steps.hint: Optional: Ring/Amulet/Jewel - loot 2 Baryas, insert into pedestals (side edges)

steps.description: Talk to **NPCs**, waypoint to **The Galai Gates**
Tag **Waypoint**, activate **Seven Pillars** (boost can be changed anytime)
steps.hint: Seven Pillars is a side area

steps.description: Kill **Azmadi, the Faridun Prince**, activate **Grand Barya**
steps.hint: Optional: Currency - loot 2 vials for 2 wells

steps.description: Talk to **NPCs**, talk to **Hooded One** - Proceed to **Mount Kriar (Act 7)**

steps.hint: Optional: Skill gem in Ancient Monument

steps.description: Kill **Rakkar, the Frozen Talon**, tag **Waypoint** in **Kriar Peaks** (in-out)
Kill **The Abominable Yeti**, take **Icy Tusks**, portal to **Town**
Talk to **Hilda** (Book of Specialization), waypoint to **Kriar Peaks**
Take gift from **Elder Madox** (item of choice), enter **Etched Ravine**
steps.hint: Elder Madox - long, narrow passage along the edge

steps.description: Kill **Stormgore, the Guardian**, enter **The Cuachic Vault**
Kill **Zelina and Zolin** (Blood Priestess and Priest), summon **Doryani**, portal to **Town**
Talk to **NPCs**, talk to **Hooded One** (Book of Specialization) - Travel to **Oriath**
Check **Character  Quest Passives** to verify all passive boosts collected!
steps.hint: Make sure you collected all skill points, spirit boosts, and other passive rewards before endgame

steps.description: Talk to **Alva**, talk to **Doryani**, use **Map Device** - Run one map to unlock mapping
Start mapping in hideout - **Leveling guide complete!**
